title: Europa: Ocean Under Ice
description: A 60-second lesson on Europa: Ocean Under Ice.

hook.text: Jupiter's moon Europa is covered in smooth ice. What's hiding underneath?

buildup.text: Tidal forces from Jupiter's gravity flex Europa, generating internal heat.

discovery.text: That heat keeps a liquid ocean beneath the ice â€” possibly 100 km deep.

twist.text: This ocean contains more water than all of Earth's oceans combined.

climax.text: Where there's liquid water and energy, there could be life.

punchline.text: The best place to find alien life might be a frozen moon.
